content:
path /v3/nft/collection/chain/address
operationid nftgettokensbycollectionerc721
parameters
description the blockchain to work with
in path
name chain
required true
schema
type string
description max number of items per page is 50
in query
name pagesize
schema
type number
maximum 50
minimum 1
required true
description offset to obtain next page of the data
in query
name offset
schema
type number
description the blockchain address of the collection
in path
name address
required true
schema
type string
summary get all nfts from a collection
description 1 credit per api call  5 credits for each listed nft
get all nfts from a collection all the nfts that were minted on the smart contract
this api is supported for the following blockchains

celo
ethereum
polygon
responses
200
schema
type array
nfttokenbycollectionerc721
type object
required
tokenid
properties
tokenid
description id of the token
type string
maxlength 78
format uint256
nfttokenbycollectionerc721tokenmetadata
type object
required
tokenid
properties
tokenid
description tokenid of the nft token owned by this address
type string
maxlength 78
format uint256
url
description metadata url of the tokenid this data dont have to be present safest way if not present is to obtain them from the nft contracttokenuri method call
type string
metadata
type object
description metadata scheme obtained from the url this data dont have to be present safest way if not present is to obtain them from the nft contracttokenuri method call
description ok
tag_summary:
nft stands for nonfungible token which means that each token is unique and irreplaceable nfts are described by the erc721 standard on the ethereum blockchain or by the equivalent standard on the other blockchains
nfts can be used for nearly any digital asset or good to ensure authenticity and scarcity for example

ingame assets nfts can be used to create unique collectibles in the form of characters weapons skins or other equipment players can resell or trade assets directly as they choose and their authenticity is easily verifiable
music and other digital media nfts can be used to create rare and unique collectible digital releases similarly nfts can be used to sell videos art or any other type of digital media collectors can own digital originals of their favorite songs movies and so on
digital sports merchandise trading cards memorabilia classic moments in sports history and oneofakind experiences can be sold as nfts

each nftrelated api its own set of the blockchains the list of the supported blockchains is provided in the api description further in this section
title: 34_NFT (ERC-721 or compatible)_NftGetTokensByCollectionErc721_329.json
